Prepare VCF with SNVs/INDELs for use with HRDetect

Source: R/hrdetect.R
hrdetect_prep_snvindel.Rd

Prepares VCF with SNVs/INDELs for use with HRDetect.

hrdetect_prep_snvindel(
  x,
  nm = NULL,
  genome = "hg38",
  outdir = NULL,
  sigsToUse = c(1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 8, 13, 17, 18, 20, 26, 30)
)

Arguments

x

Path to VCF with SNVs and INDELs.
nm

Sample name.
genome

Human genome version (default: hg38. hg19 means GRCh37).
outdir

Directory to output analysis results.
sigsToUse

COSMIC signatures to use.

Value

List with two elements:

  • snv_results: tibble with exposure score and p-value for chosen signatures.

  • indel_results: tibble with a summary of the count of indels and their proportion.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/umccrise/snv/somatic-ensemble-PASS.vcf.gz", package = "gpgr")
(l <- hrdetect_prep_snvindel(x, nm = "sampleA", outdir = tempdir()))

#> $snv_results
#> # A tibble: 12 x 3
#>    sig          exposure pvalue
#>    <chr>           <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1 Signature.1      712.   0   
#>  2 Signature.2        0    0.63
#>  3 Signature.3     1763.   0   
#>  4 Signature.5      761.   0.01
#>  5 Signature.6        0    0.94
#>  6 Signature.8     1665.   0   
#>  7 Signature.13     390.   0   
#>  8 Signature.17       0    1   
#>  9 Signature.18       0    1   
#> 10 Signature.20       0    1   
#> 11 Signature.26       0    1   
#> 12 Signature.30       0    1   
#> 
#> $indel_results
#> # A tibble: 1 x 12
#>   sample del.mh del.rep del.none   ins all.indels del.mh.prop del.rep.prop
#>   <chr>   <int>   <int>    <int> <int>      <int>       <dbl>        <dbl>
#> 1 sampl…    350     156      109   150        615       0.569        0.254
#> # … with 4 more variables: del.none.prop <dbl>, del.mh.count <int>,
#> #   del.rep.count <int>, del.none.count <int>
#>
